Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui

Class PopUp

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.PopUp
public class PopUp
extends java.lang.Object
Class for the build of the JPanel of the various PopUp
Since:
2020/06/13

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  PopUp.Close
    Class that implements ActionListener for the JButton Close which closes the current PopUp
    private class  PopUp.NewGame
    Class that extends ActionListener to return to login for a new game
    private class  PopUp.NewGameEndGameDiscon
    Class that extends ActionListener to return to login for a new game after the end of the game
    private class  PopUp.NewGameError
    Class that extends ActionListener to return to login for a new game after game error
    private class  PopUp.NewGameTurnTimer
    Class that extends ActionListener to return to login for a new game after the end of timer turn
    private class  PopUp.Send
    Class that extends ActionListener to send the new nickname
